revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC1200 |revision=(US/CA) |series=AC1200 |asin=B01ATNHG36 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, access point |fcc_date=05/29/2015 |fcc_id=MSQ-RT1D00 |ic_id=3568A-RT1D00 |pcb_id=AP-MTOE-3DC6 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628AN |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 516VA;2; |flags= |tp_firmware=Padavan |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS,ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$,,,^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.50.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-AC1200 Dual-Band Router}} :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/ Product page] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/specifications/ Specifications] {{•}} [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/gallery/ Gallery] :"AP-MTOE-3DC6" and "REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board. *FCC ID: [https://fcc.io/MSQ/-RT1D00 MSQ-RT1D00] ([[ASUS RT-AC1200]] / [[ASUS RT-N600]]) :''All models are electrically identical, different model names are for marketing purpose.'' ===Specifications=== *Super-fast concurrent dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi at up to 1167 Mbps *Improved coverage and multi-device performance with four external :5dBi antennas - two each for the 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz bands *USB 2.0 port supports AiPlayer for music streaming *Help your children stay safe online with Parental Control ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/new-asus-rt-ac1200hp-rt-ac56s-rt-n56u-v2-wireless-router.22328/ ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RTN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:62648-89#3317 ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''iXBT''' forums] (Padavan) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz WiSoC (2T2R 802.11bgn) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN (2T2R 802.11an+ac) :RAM: 64MB (DDR2), Flash 16MB (SPI, 16-pin), USB 2.0 *[http://koolshare.cn/thread-30747-1-1.html ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''KoolShare''' forums] (images PCB) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN @580MHz (WiSoC) :Flash: ''Spansion'' S25FL128SAIF00 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5TU32M16EG-AC 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7628AN (2.4GHz) + MT7612EN (5GHz) :2.4GHz PAM: 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY77627-11 ?? (•• 7627 15G15) :5GHz FEM: 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85712-21 (SKY21 85712 516VA) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1283-asus-rt-ac1200g/ ''ASUS RT-AC1200G+'' on '''Openitforum''' forums] (house) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=287041 ''ASUS RT-AC1200'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] (cpuinfo) ===Firmware=== Powerful with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} Firmware, Entware/Optware :enabled USB storage allows full Linux operation. {{SCollapse|[https://bitbucket.org/padavan/rt-n56u/src/master/trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/ ASUS RT-AC1200 board profiles] • >> |
trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/board.h

/* ASUS RT-AC1200 */

#define BOARD_PID		"RT-AC1200"
#define BOARD_NAME		"RT-AC1200"
#define BOARD_DESC		"ASUS RT-AC1200 Wireless Router"
#define BOARD_VENDOR_NAME	"ASUSTek Computer Inc."
#define BOARD_VENDOR_URL	"http://www.asus.com/"
#define BOARD_MODEL_URL		"http://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC1200/"
#define BOARD_BOOT_TIME		25
#define BOARD_FLASH_TIME	120
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_RESET	5
#define BOARD_GPIO_BTN_WPS	11
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_ALL	4
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WIFI
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_POWER	37
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_LAN
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_WAN
#define BOARD_GPIO_LED_USB	6
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_LED_ROUTER
#undef  BOARD_GPIO_PWR_USB
#define BOARD_HAS_5G_11AC	1
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_5G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_TX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ANT_2G_RX	2
#define BOARD_NUM_ETH_LEDS	1
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_L1000	0
#define BOARD_HAS_EPHY_W1000	0

trunk/configs/boards/RT-AC1200/board.mk

##################################################################
# Board PID   # Board Name        # PRODUCT # Note
##################################################################
# RT-AC1200   # ASUS RT-AC1200    # MT7628  #
##################################################################

CFLAGS += -DBOARD_AC1200 -DVENDOR_ASUS
BOARD_NUM_USB_PORTS=1
}} *https://github.com/russinnes/RT-N600-Padavan *https://github.com/StarWhiz/Asus-RT-AC1200-Padavan ===Serial=== 
admin@RT-AC1200:/tmp/home/root# cat /proc/cpuinfo

system type             : MT7628 
processor               : 0 
cpu model               : MIPS 24Kc V5.5 
BogoMIPS                : 386.04 
wait instruction        : yes 
microsecond timers      : yes 
tlb_entries             : 32 
extra interrupt vector  : yes 
hardware watchpoint     : yes, count: 4, address/irw mask: 
                          [0x0000, 0x0d88, 0x08b0, 0x0198] 
ASEs implemented        : mips16 dsp 
shadow register sets    : 1 
core                    : 0 
VCED exceptions         : not available 
VCEI exceptions         : not available
__NOTOC__
